COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0
STRING: I finished eating, and before I knew it, I found myself
heading towards the Old Wing once again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e
STRING: I couldn't hear any singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a
STRING: But if I played my Fortelle for a while, it would soon be
the time that Lise would arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140
STRING: We had made no agreement to meet, and there was no
guarantee that I could do an ensemble with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x156
STRING: And on top of that, she wouldn't have been coming
here every single day, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162
STRING: Nevertheless, I headed to the music rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e
STRING: Of course, I made a point of not choosing the room that
Lise always used.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4
STRING: But hoping that I could hear her voice if she came, I
chose the room that was next to hers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba
STRING: I had no reason to rush, so I leisurely set up my Fortelle
and lazily placed my fingers on the keyboard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0
STRING: However, I enjoyed playing the Fortelle in itself, so I
soon found myself motivated to play.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6
STRING: As for the song...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2
STRING: It wasn't a hard choice, considering that I was here now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x258
STRING: As it was my second time to play it, I did much better
this time around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: Although I didn't have a score for it, the music was
mostly in my memory.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270
STRING: Truth be told, it wasn't the kind of song that left a
strong impression.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c
STRING: Even so, it was easy to recall Lise's voice singing it, and
thanks to that I never forgot how the song went.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x292
STRING: [Chris] “I might just play it one more time...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a8
STRING: And at that moment, I remembered that last time Lise
was standing behind me watching, so I decided to turn
around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dc
STRING: [Chris] “Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fa
STRING: [Lise] “Ah!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x310
STRING: Our eyes met, and we both froze in place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31c
STRING: [Chris] “H-Hey...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33a
STRING: [Lise] “G-Good afternoon...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x350
STRING: Although surprised, Lise exchanged pleasantries and
then blushed as if she remembered what happened last
time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x382
STRING: [Lise] “I'm sorry, excuse me!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c2
STRING: I was starting to get used to seeing her run off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ce
STRING: I thought about playing again, and the song...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da
STRING: Was of course going to be the same one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fa
STRING: Even though it was my second time playing it, for some
reason I was doing worse than before this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x410
STRING: I supposed it was because I had been wondering about
Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41c
STRING: Deep down, a part of me was unsure if I should come
here or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x432
STRING: It was true that I had been curious about Lise, but
perhaps I felt afraid of getting too involved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x452
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x468
STRING: I briefly rotated my shoulders to relax them, and then
went on to play the parts that I'd been having trouble
with.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47e
STRING: [Chris] “Nope... This part's not quite right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x494
STRING: My rhythm was slightly off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a8
STRING: [Lise] “You need to pause half a beat...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4be
STRING: [Chris] “Hm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f0
STRING: Upon turning about, I could see Lise peeking at me from
behind the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x510
STRING: [Chris] “Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52e
STRING: [Lise] “Ah!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x544
STRING: Our eyes met, and we both froze in place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x550
STRING: [Chris] “H-Hey...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56e
STRING: [Lise] “G-Good afternoon...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x584
STRING: Although surprised, Lise exchanged pleasantries and
then blushed as if she remembered what happened last
time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b6
STRING: [Lise] “I'm sorry, excuse me!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f6
STRING: I was starting to get used to seeing her run off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x602
STRING: Not bothering to chase after Lise, I instead did as she
said and tried pausing half a beat before continuing,
and it felt like a piece of a puzzle sliding perfectly into
place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x622
STRING: [Chris] “So that's what I needed to do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x638
STRING: It would have been a different story had I been using a
score.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x644
STRING: But for the time being, I had committed that part of the
song to memory.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x650
STRING: [Chris] “Well then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x666
STRING: I thought about playing again, and the song...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x672
STRING: Was of course going to be the same one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a6
STRING: After repeating the parts that I had felt were
incomplete, I noticed I could faintly hear a voice singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6cc
STRING: [Lise] “As if right in the corner of the classroom...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e2
STRING: Listening to that voice, I started to play my Fortelle in
time with it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f8
STRING: I had the feeling that if I tried it now, she wouldn't panic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x704
STRING: For a split second, her voice stopped, but immediately
began to sing again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72c
STRING: That made me so happy, and the time we spent playing
was so much fun that I lost track of how many times we
rehearsed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x742
STRING: Even though I couldn't see her on the other side of the
wall, every time we finished the song she would catch
her breath and wait for me to start playing my
Fortelle again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x762
STRING: I thought I may have been imagining it, but when I tried
leaving a longer gap between songs, the result was the
same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x778
STRING: I guess this counted as having done an ensemble with
her, then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78e
STRING: I thought that I could hear Lise breathing now from the
other side of the thin wall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a4
STRING: If I closed my eyes, it almost felt as if she was standing
right there as she sang.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d4
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, I'm beat...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80a
STRING: It was starting to get dark outside, which told me that
we'd been practicing for some time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x822
STRING: What I was doing still had nothing to do with the
graduation recital, but perhaps that would change in
the future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x838
STRING: It had taken us this long just to do an ensemble
together, so I wondered if it would actually even be
possible to have her be my graduation recital partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85a
STRING: Of course, I hadn't decided if I wanted her to be my
partner or not yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x866
STRING: However... There was something enchanting about her
voice, and I had been going over it in my head and felt
that she would have been a fine choice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87c
STRING: Furthermore...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88a
STRING: Seeing the way she acted with such little confidence, I
felt that she needed to realize that she was much more
capable than she seemed to think.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a0
STRING: Why had she been so hesitant to do even a simple
rehearsal?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ae
STRING: Her voice was quite frankly, wonderful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ba
STRING: She looked like she was really enjoying herself when
she sang, and after rehearsing with her just now, I
realized that she just purely enjoys it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: In that case, why didn't she want to perform?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e0
STRING: I wasn't able to go and ask her directly, and yet I didn't
want to just leave her be, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f6
STRING: Even though I couldn't talk to Lise that much, just
rehearsing like we did earlier made me feel that she
would slowly start to change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x918
STRING: Even I thought it was a pretty roundabout way of doing
things, and it was rare for me to be this interested in
someone else's affairs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92e
STRING: But, I had to say that I was enjoying this too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94c
STRING: [Chris] “Well then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x972
STRING: Lise had stopped singing some time ago.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x980
STRING: I wonder if she'd already gone home?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98c
STRING: I too decided to go home, and began folding up my
Fortelle stand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a2
STRING: I'd done it a countless number of times now and could
probably have done it with my eyes closed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ba
STRING: Letting my hands do the work, I looked around the
music room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c6
STRING: I had heard that it was only cleaned about once a
month, but I guess since people rarely came here in the
first place, it didn't seem that dirty at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e6
STRING: However, I suppose it did leave the impression that it
was quite old.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f2
STRING: The walls were so thin that every sound in the next
room could be heard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fe
STRING: Although it was thanks to those thin walls that I was
able to have so much fun today...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0c
STRING: In the beginning, I had thought that it wouldn't be a
good environment for classes, but now I felt that
perhaps it had its own charm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa22
STRING: If you listened carefully... Actually, even if you didn't try
to listen at all, it was the kind of place where you could
have always heard music coming from other rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3a
STRING: It was true that the facilities were inferior to what we
had now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa46
STRING: But I felt that students back in those days had enjoyed
it the way it was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa70
STRING: [Chris] “I guess I'll call it a day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa86
STRING: I packed up the stand and put my Fortelle in its case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa92
STRING: I shut the case properly so that the rain wouldn't leak in,
and slung it over my shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9e
STRING: I hadn't used any scores either, so all that was left was
to carry my bag.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaaa
STRING: When I stood up and went to walk towards the door, I
noticed that Lise was there again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae4
STRING: Her facial expression was still one of nervousness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf0
STRING: Even so, she didn't show any signs of being surprised at
me noticing her presence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafc
STRING: It was safe to say that she had been waiting for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb08
STRING: I wasn't expecting to be able to have an intimate chat
with her, but I hoped we could at least talk a little, so I
started off in a friendly manner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1e
STRING: [Chris] “That was good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb50
STRING: [Lise] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb66
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb98
STRING: [Lise] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbae
STRING: [Chris] “I know I just started playing like that, but... It
was fun.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbee
STRING: [Chris] “Did I bother you...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0c
STRING: [Lise] “No... Uh... You didn't bother me at all...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc22
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry I couldn't play so well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc54
STRING: [Lise] “No!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc82
STRING: That's not... Not true at all...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8e
STRING: [Chris] “Really? Why thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca4
STRING: And then, for a few moments the two of us remained
silent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb0
STRING: Lise seemed to be looking for words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcbc
STRING: I waited patiently for her to speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc8
STRING: And then, the words that came from her mouth were
not entirely different to what I had imagined.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfa
STRING: [Lise] “Why... Do you come here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd10
STRING: [Chris] “To be honest...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd26
STRING: I didn't feel like beating around the bush, or trying to
say something else just to make her relax.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3c
STRING: [Chris] “I've been coming here because I wanted to do
an ensemble with you. I've wanted to ever since I first
heard you sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd86
STRING: [Chris] “Did I make you feel uncomfortable?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb8
STRING: [Lise] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdce
STRING: Lise turned away briefly in a moment of hesitation and
then spoke clearly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe00
STRING: [Lise] “You didn't make me feel uncomfortable...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe16
STRING: [Chris] “Okay... That's good to hear.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe48
STRING: [Lise] “I-I'll... be going now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5e
STRING: [Chris] “Hey... Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe90
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea6
STRING: [Chris] “Are you going to be here again tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed8
STRING: [Lise] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeee
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0c
STRING: [Lise] “I have other things I must do this week.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4a
STRING: Saying only that, Lise then ran off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf56
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6c
STRING: I guess that meant that it was okay for me to come
here?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf78
STRING: I suppose my assumption was a little self-serving, but I
decided to try coming back again next week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc8
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfde
STRING: I quickly dried my hair and immediately got into bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfea
STRING: Today was just another day, and it was coming to an
end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff6
STRING: Despite the fact that I had something very important to
do, which was finding a partner for the recital, I was
feeling content with my through-the-wall ensembles.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1030
STRING: [Phorni] “Going to bed already?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1046
STRING: Sitting in her usual place, Phorni looked bored as she
swung her legs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... I feel a bit tired.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1072
STRING: I wasn't entirely sleepy, but I didn't have the energy to
deal with Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a4
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris, Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: [Chris] “What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ec
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm bored...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110a
STRING: ＊Flutter＊Flutter＊Flutter＊

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1116
STRING: [Chris] “That must be terrible...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1148
STRING: [Phorni] “You don't think you should give me a little
attention?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1174
STRING: Phorni fluttered around in circles above my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1180
STRING: That was her way of protesting, but I had my own pace
and my own feelings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1196
STRING: [Chris] “You don't think you should let a tired person
rest?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ca
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e0
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f6
STRING: The silence continued for a few moments.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1218
STRING: It seemed that she had given up, as she flew off
somewhere.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1224
STRING: I could tell that was going to lead to what she did next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1230
STRING: But since I was laying in bed, there was nothing I could
do to stop her...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125c
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris is so distant, recently...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127a
STRING: I wasn't sure how she had managed to do it, but she
had removed my letter opener from the drawer, and
was scratching words onto the wall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1290
STRING: Given no other choice, I dragged myself out of bed and
grabbed Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris is so rough recently...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ce
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, I'm up, so could you stop that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1300
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris is kind of nice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1316
STRING: Kind of, huh?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1322
STRING: Was it too much to ask to have my feelings reflected,
since I was the one being bothered?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1338
STRING: [Chris] “So, this is what I did today...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1364
STRING: I told Phorni about what I had done today, and after
that another typical day came to an end.
